mutate.title: {type, select, delete {Delete} other {Restore}} {count, plural, one {media} other {medias}}
mutate.description: You're about to {type, select, delete {delete} other {restore}} {count, plural, one {a media} other {# medias}}. Are you sure?
mutate.deleteWarning: The {count, plural, one {media} other {medias}} CAN be restored later.
mutate.confirmationDescription: To confirm that this is what you want, type "<confirmationText></confirmationText>" in the field below.
mutate.confirmationText: {type, select, delete {delete} other {restore}} {count, plural, one {media} other {medias}}
mutate.loading: {type, select, delete {Deleting} other {Restoring}} {count, plural, one {media} other {medias}}...
mutate.success: {count, plural, one {Media} other {Medias}} {type, select, delete {deleted} other {restored}} successfully!
mutate.error: An unexpected error occurred when {type, select, delete {deleting} other {restoring}} the {count, plural, one {media} other {medias}}.
